meanings.sent1: She bought the chinchiest dress she could find at the thrift store.
meanings.sent2: The store always sells the chinchiest items at discounted prices.
meanings.sent3: He was so chinchiest with his money that he reused tea bags multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The chinchiest landlord refused to fix the leaking roof despite numerous complaints.
meanings.sent5: The chinchiest customer argued over every cent on the bill.

meanings.definition: Of the poorest quality or lowest value
meanings.sent1: The chinchiest shoes fell apart after just a few days of wear.
meanings.sent2: The store was known for selling the chinchiest electronics that always broke.
meanings.sent3: The chinchiest sandwich he made tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her chinchiest painting was quickly dismissed by the art critics.
meanings.sent5: The chinchiest car on the lot had rust all over and a cracked windshield.
